msbt.message: This area doesn't have any buildings, so it's perfect for running around!
HEEEEYAAAA!There aren't any buildings around here, so it's a great place to train your vocal cords, .

There's a lot of empty space in this area, so it's perfect for an outdoor training program.I've got it all planned out. We'll do push-ups, sit-ups, chin-ups and then squatsWhat? All those exercises can be done inside?! Holy protein shakes You're right, !
I didn't think I'd run into you here! Hey! Wanna get a few laps in with me, ?
There you are! You all set for our giant-muscle showdown?Huh? Did I catch you off guard? Let that be a lessonâ€”never let your guard down, !
Are you jogging near my home? Brilliant, !I'm up for that. I guess we could just do laps around my house until one of us drops
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Have you ever set foot in 's place?That drink makes <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's really, really good, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So this tent is your home, huh? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like it!I bet you feel close to nature, like you could just roll out of bed and onto a 10-mile hike.That's so cool, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is this your place?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Wow, it's so cozy. I really like it!Me, I just need enough floor space for push-ups and sit-ups. Then I'm happy as can be, .
Whoa! Your place is lookin' mighty!Hey, you're not planning on building a big, awesome indoor arena, are you?You are, aren't you? You're realizing my dream before me, !
Your place is big! You got a bunch of training rooms or something in there, ?Listen, more rooms and a ton of machines won't get you muscles! ButI am kinda jealous.
Your home looks like it's on a serious muscle-expansion program! Nice!I bet you get a super-good workout from all the cleaning you have to do. You must be so sore, .
Wow! Your place is like a stadium!There's no type of training you can't do in a place that big, !
Two stories?! Wow! Your house is something else!Lemme think First floor's the gym. Second floor's the break room That's pretty good, !
Is it true?! Does your house have a basement now, ?Wow, that's cool! I want a secret underground lair too!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s home is a tent, right?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It must feel like you're camping every day! I think I'll stop by for a visit sometime, .

's place is right here. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />But hold on a sec<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wouldn't it be funny to hide nearby until we see them, and then jump out and go, "Surprise, !"
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, have you been over to 's place?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's really big. I bet it'd be super fun to do a relay race over there, just the three of us.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s home is really big, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I had no idea had so much hustle. They're gonna turn that place into a castle!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Looks like 's place has been on a treadmill. It's seriously bulked up!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />'s a true athlete. One glance at that house and you just know, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, are you ever curious about 's place? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like what happens in there?Maybe it's strength training? Oh no! Is stronger than me, ?!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't stop thinking about how 's place has a second story.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm so jealous! I wish my place had two stories, !If it did, I could spend every day outside, climbing my walls
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been thinking a lot about how 's place has a basement, .I just KNOW it's a secret celebrity gym. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I gotta figure out how to join!

<20_2 arg="10" />You see Timmy's shop over at Resident Services? You gotta check out that fire in his eyes!<20_3 arg="6" />It's the same determined fire I get before a big bench press. He's not selling much yet, but just you wait!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Timmy's selling some really great stuff at Nook's Cranny.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm actually kind of a celebrity there. I get surrounded with help the moment I enter, .Ah, the perks of being a major league star
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Have you seen all the stuff that Nook's Cranny is selling? What a seriously swole inventory!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder if they'll ever go global,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The museum seems kinda flimsy at this point, doesn't it? <20_3 arg="6" />I hope you've been helping 'em out. They need it!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Huh? Me?Heh heh, I already have a specimen to care for. This bod ain't gonna sculpt itself, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />If you get stumped with a question, Resident Services is the place to get it answered, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like, for instance, I asked Isabelle if we could get a training gym. She said no.OK, so that wasn't the answer I was afterbut it was totally an answer!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey! What're you doing at the airport? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Heading off to meet someone?Huh? What am I doing here? Duh! I'm doing visualization exercises about going on a trip, !
Don't you think the plaza'd be an awesome place for some team sports, ? The losing teams could even take a bit of dirt home with them. Along with some rotten veggies, probably
The footing in the plaza is PERFECT for doing sprint starts.But it's also so crowded that it's easy to sprint straight into someone.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sable and Mabel both work super hard at the tailors. I have serious respect for what they do.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Still, whenever I ask them for something that shows off my muscles, they just laugh.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice! Looks like we got a new guest coming by! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder if they'll be as ripped as I am,
Waityou can just plant produce in the ground and water it, and it'll grow?Be right back. Burying my delts.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Museums are like going through a time warp. Time goes by so fast there!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The other day, I went to the museum in the morning and was surprised it was dark when I walked out. I mean, yeah, I fell asleep in there. But it didn't feel like it was THAT long of a nap,
I've got a lot of respect for the they have in the museum. I should do some observation. I bet I could learn a thing or two about fluid motion, .
I really aspire to be like the they have in the museum. The way it moves Yes! My bug visualization training is now complete, !
Oh, the in the museum is so cool!If I'm ever lucky enough to become a fossil, I wanna be displayed just like that, .
The museum's got this really cool .I just stare at it, and stareand I get so relaxed and<10_4 /> You can't buy a nap like that, !
